alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 3:54AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, Gulf and eastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden, Liberty and western Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 445 AM EST/345 AM CST/... At 354 AM EST/254 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Blountstown to 7 miles southwest of Port St. Joe. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Apalachicola, Quincy, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Chattahoochee, Orange, Wewahitchka, Gretna, Bristol, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman, Abe Springs, Vilas and Chipola Cutoff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EST/800 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty
